identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a personnel scheduling system that feels like a Swiss control room—precise, high-contrast, and functionally beautiful.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Poster aesthetics with SaaS utility.
Emotion First: Scheduling is stressful; the UI must be calm and authoritative.
Content is King: The schedule IS the hero. No decorative fluff.
Zoom In: Focus on the shift details.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to separate days and shifts.

headings.usage: Use for all page titles, modal headers, and date displays. Weight: 700 or 900 for impact.

body.usage: Use for all grid content, shift details, and form inputs. Excellent legibility at small sizes.

mono.usage: Use for time slots (e.g., '09:00 - 17:00') and ID numbers.

calendar.structure: grid-cols-8 (1 col for time labels, 7 cols for days)
calendar.header: Sticky top row with day names
calendar.interaction: Drag and drop enabled using @dnd-kit or framer-motion reorder

shift_card.style: Ticket style. White background, subtle shadow, colored left border indicating shift type.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-full font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 rounded-full font-medium

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b-2 border-border focus:border-primary focus:outline-none rounded-none px-0 py-2 transition-colors

assets.icons: Use Lucide React. Stroke width: 1.5px for elegance.

layout_strategies.dashboard: Sidebar navigation (left) + Main Content (right). Main content uses 'Control Room' grid.
layout_strategies.login: Split screen. Left: Branding/Art (Store Image with overlay). Right: Login Form (Clean, minimal).
layout_strategies.modal: Backdrop blur-sm. Modal content: White bg, sharp corners, generous padding.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3, ease: 'easeOut' }}

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA standards).
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
Do not use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Chivo'.
Forms should feel like filling out a high-end manifest, not a tax document.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-precision scheduling tool. Focus on the 'Calendar' component—it is the heart of the app. It must handle drag-and-drop smoothly. Use the provided image URLs for the store selection screen to give it a premium feel. Implement the 'Swiss Utility' theme by strictly adhering to the color palette and typography rules.
